statements: DELETE FROM user_recommendations WHERE user_id = 100 AND recommendation_type = 'New';
DELETE FROM user_recommendations WHERE user_id = 123 AND device_id = 456;
DELETE FROM DeviceData WHERE data_type = 'temperature' AND data_value > 100.0;
DELETE FROM UserProfiles WHERE age < 18 OR gender = 'other';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM smart_tv_data WHERE duration < 60 AND video_viewed = 'News'
DELETE FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 101 AND recommendation_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM devices WHERE last_connection < '2022-01-01' AND device_type = 'Mobile';
